allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Aesta Management App

Complete construction site management application with:
- Company and site dashboards
- Attendance tracking and work logs
- Laborer and team management
- Contracts and payments tracking
- Expense and salary management
- Client payment plans and tracking
- Construction phases management

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Refactor client payments to use reusable FileUploader component

- Created new FileUploader component for consistent file upload UI
- Refactored client-payments page to use FileUploader
- Removed duplicate file upload logic and validation
- Improved code reusability and maintainability

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Paid By and Subcontract columns to expenses and payments pages

- Add always-visible "Paid By" and "Subcontract" columns to site expenses table
- Add "Paid By" and "Subcontract" columns to payments detail panel
- Add SettlementEditDialog for editing payment mode, subcontract link, proof upload, and notes
- Add "Unlinked" filter option to subcontract dropdown in payments page

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add visible label for subcontract link option in settlement edit dialog

- Add "Link to Subcontract" header with LinkIcon for better visibility
- Subcontract linking only shows for daily laborer records

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(xargs -I {} sh -c 'grep -l ""CREATE POLICY\\|ALTER TABLE.*ENABLE ROW"" ""{}"" && echo ""$*""')

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Move NotificationBell from sidebar to App bar

- Add NotificationBell to top App bar after Sync Status indicator
- Remove NotificationBell from sidebar \(both icon bar and full drawer modes\)
- Fix type errors in DateSettlementsEditDialog and settlementService

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add contract payment tracking with date, type, and payment history

Features:
- Add actual payment date and payment type \(salary/advance/other\) to contract payments
- Add unique payment reference codes \(PAY-YYYYMM-NNN\) for each payment
- Add PaymentRefDialog to view payment details by clicking ref chips
- Add Payment History button in Contract Weekly tab with date-wise view
- Fix "Payment not found" bug for old SET-* format references
- Add edit/delete dialogs for contract payments
- Add trust_account as payer source option

Database:
- Add payment_type, actual_payment_date, payment_reference columns to labor_payments
- Add payment_week_allocations table for salary allocation tracking
- Add settlement_group_id to labor_payments for linking
- Add generate_payment_reference\(\) function
- Add advance tracking columns and view

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add settlements overview dialog and fix settlement dates

- Create SettlementsOverviewDialog with summary cards, MRT table, and image gallery
- Update ContractWeeklyPaymentsTab to show clickable ref chips in tooltip
- Click individual ref chip opens PaymentRefDialog for details
- Click "X settlements" chip opens SettlementsOverviewDialog with overview
- Add lightbox for full-size payment proof viewing
- Fix backfilled settlement dates \(18 Nov showing as 22 Dec issue\)

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add auto-scroll, back button, and fix payer source display

- Add back button to payments page when navigating from expenses via ref code
- Add auto-scroll to highlighted row in SalarySettlementTable
- Add auto-scroll to highlighted row in ContractWeeklyPaymentsTab
- Add settlementReferences to ContractLaborerPaymentView type
- Fix DateSettlementsEditDialog to update settlement_groups payer source
- Fix payer_source NULL display in v_all_expenses view \(default to Own Money\)
- Fix pre-existing type issues in ContractWeeklyPaymentsTab

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Restore week-wise view as default with toggle for laborer view

- Add viewMode toggle: "Weeks" \(default\) and "Laborers" views
- Week-wise view shows weeks as primary rows with laborers nested inside
- Laborer-wise view shows laborers as primary rows with weeks nested inside
- Both views support status, subcontract, and team filters
- Both views support highlighting from ref code navigation
- Add WeekRowData interface and week data processing

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add date-wise settlement tracking with data recovery scripts

Features:
- Enhanced Contract Weekly Tab with date-wise settlement grouping
- Maestri earnings tracking with configurable margin per day
- Settlement view/edit/delete dialogs for weekly contract payments
- Engineer Wallet enhanced with transaction detail/edit/delete dialogs
- ScreenshotViewer component for in-app proof image viewing

Fixes:
- Fixed fetchSubcontracts paid amount calculation in expenses page
- Fixed settlement grouping to use work date instead of payment date
- Restored daily/market settlements with proper subcontract linking

Scripts:
- fix-settlement-grouping.ts: Corrects settlement ref codes per work date
- link-settlements-to-subcontracts.ts: Links restored settlements
- restore-daily-settlements.ts: Recreates settlements from attendance data
- check-db-state.ts: Database state verification utility

Migrations:
- add_maestri_margin.sql: Adds maestri_margin_per_day to subcontracts
- date_wise_settlement_fields.sql: Adds settlement_type, week_allocations
- settlement_wallet_spending_fix.sql: Fixes wallet spending calculations

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix Contract Weekly Tab transaction display and add Daily Settlements dashboard

Fixes:
- Contract Weekly Tab now correctly fetches settlement references from
  settlement_groups table \(SET-* format\) instead of labor_payments \(PAY-*\)
- Added Tooltip to Transactions column showing clickable ref codes on hover
- Fixed getDateWiseSettlements to work without week_allocations field
  \(falls back to settlement_date filtering\)
- WeekSettlementsDialogV2 now displays restored settlements correctly

New Features:
- Added summary dashboard to Daily Settlements tab showing:
  - Total Salary
  - Paid amount
  - Outstanding amount
  - Payment progress percentage

Scripts:
- fix-settlement-week-allocations.ts: Adds week_allocations JSONB to
  restored settlements so they appear in the week dialog

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Remove redundant top summary cards and add circular progress to Daily Settlements

Changes:
- Removed PaymentSummaryCards from Daily Settlements tab \(top row was redundant\)
- Changed Progress indicator from LinearProgress to CircularProgress with
  percentage shown inside the circle
- Kept the clean dashboard with: Total Salary, Paid, Outstanding, Progress

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix advance payment recording and display in contract payments

- Fix "No weeks to process" error for advance payments by allowing empty weeks
- Add payment_type column to Contract Settlement History table \(Salary/Advance/Other\)
- Include advance/other payments in fetch queries \(they have no labor_payments\)
- Update summary dashboard to include advance payments in totals
- Show "-" for laborer count on advance/other payments

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Update navigation labels, fix migrations, and various improvements

- Fix Daily & Market settlement payment source showing "Unspecified"
- Update navigation labels \(Price Comparison, Vendor Directory\)
- Fix batch_tracking migration \(s.status instead of s.is_active\)
- Fix price_analytics migration \(recorded_date instead of effective_date\)
- Add material seed data, batch tracking, inter-site settlement, price analytics migrations
- Various tea shop, settlement, and attendance improvements

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(powershell -Command "\(Get-Content ''supabase\\migrations\\20251214100000_material_management.sql''\) -replace ''IF NOT EXISTS\([a-z]\)'', ''IF NOT EXISTS $1'' | Set-Content ''supabase\\migrations\\20251214100000_material_management.sql''")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add rental management, group tea shop features, and fix type exports

- Add rental management system \(company & site pages, components, hooks\)
- Add group tea shop feature for site groups with shared tea vendors
- Restore helper type exports in database.types.ts after regeneration
- Fix various type errors for build compatibility
- Remove deprecated salary pages

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Consolidate migrations and sync with remote database

- Replace 96+ individual migrations with 4 consolidated files
- Add initial_schema.sql with full database structure
- Add remote_schema.sql with current DB state
- Add rental_management.sql and group_tea_shop.sql for new features
- Backup old migrations to migrations_backup folder
- Add supabase config and seed files

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Store Catalog feature for vendors with price comparison

- Add Store Catalog page accessible via "View Store" button on vendor detail page
- Create ProductCard component with photo display and price comparison badges
- Add CategoryFilterTabs for filtering products by material categories
- Implement ProductDetailDrawer showing full details and competing vendor prices
- Add AddProductDialog to link existing materials to vendor inventory
- Add image upload capability to MaterialDialog for product photos
- Create useStoreCatalog hook with price comparison logic
- Add storeCatalog query keys for React Query caching

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix group tea shop entry editing and session handling

- Fix group entry editing when context is not available by fetching tea shop and site group from entry IDs
- Use correct table names \(tea_shop_entries, tea_shop_entry_allocations\)
- Preserve is_percentage_override and percentage_split fields when editing
- Increase session timeout from 5s to 10s and expiry buffer from 2 to 5 minutes
- Add session refresh logging and validation checks
- Remove debug console.log statements

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Filter tea-shop page to show only selected site''s data

- Remove "All Sites" dropdown filter from tea-shop page
- Always filter entries and settlements by the currently selected site
- For group entries, show only the allocated amount for the selected site
- Update info banners to clarify site-specific filtering
- Clean up unused imports and state variables

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix holiday dialog showing wrong date for unfilled dates

- Add date prop to HolidayConfirmDialog to accept specific dates
- Add selectedHolidayDate state to track which date to mark as holiday
- Add selectedExistingHoliday state to track existing holidays for revoke
- Update handleMarkUnfilledAsHoliday to check database directly for existing holidays
- Show correct date in dialog instead of always showing today''s date
- Automatically open revoke dialog if date is already a holiday
- Add pre-insert check to prevent duplicate holiday constraint errors

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix holiday UI not refreshing after marking a date as holiday

- Export SiteHoliday type from HolidayConfirmDialog for reuse
- Update onSuccess callback to pass newly created holiday data
- Update handleHolidaySuccess to immediately add holiday to recentHolidays state
- Fix checkTodayHoliday date range to properly use dateTo instead of arbitrary 30-day limit
- Remove unused thirtyDaysLater variable

The UI now instantly shows the holiday row after marking, without waiting for async refresh.

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Fix salary settlement 400 error by removing invalid site_id filter from teams query
